regen.absent_element: notification or logging for normal operation (no alarm condition)
regen.new_specification: The system shall log events indicating normal operation when no alarm condition is detected.

regen.absent_element: system-wide notification for active alarm state
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify all relevant subsystems or monitoring platforms when an alarm condition is detected, in addition to generating sound alerts and recording the event.

regen.absent_element: action of logging alarm resolution time
regen.new_specification: The system shall record the timestamp when the supervisor resets the alarm for audit purposes.

label: This series of beeps shall continue until the supervisor manually resets the alarm through the supervisor's interface window.
